thread.section_title: Choice Home Warranty Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Choice Home Warranty | www.choicehomewarranty.com
thread.title: Ann Wiley
thread.title_full: Choice Home Warranty reviewed by Ann Wiley

author: Ann Wiley
title: Ann Wiley
text: I've had Choice Home Warranty fir over a year and a half and never had to use it, but recently my oven quit working. I called Choice and without in an hour someone was on the way to fix my problem. I would highly recommend Choice Home Warranty to anyone. In fact I have gone so.
